attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The closure of Vauxhall Motors, Ellesmere Port, will have a devestating effect on the Wirral and surrounding areas as it is one of the main employer to the residents of Wirral.  Also, if this employer is lost, so will the skilled workers that this country needs because Vauxhall also runs apprenticeship schemes to train skilled workers of the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
